about_the_game: The official Mortal Sin Soundtrack, composed by Mikko Norojärvi. These tracks are the love child of Progressive Rock, Metal, Classical, Ambient, creating a unique style all its own. A perfect complement to demon slaying, working out and studying all at once! All of the songs from Mortal Sin are featured here, including unreleased bonus tracks from the older beta version of the game. Overall, there are 20+ masterfully composed and highly detailed tracks, all in high quality for your listening pleasure.
